comment.author: 72041338@N00
comment._content: Your map shows "Port au Choix" but it should be -- as the picture says -- Port au Port which is about 200 km south of Port au Choix.

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Corrected I think. (This is a good workout for my Canadian geography).

comment.author: 72041338@N00
comment._content: You've done it well, *I* think. "Port au Port" is a town nowadays, but previously (and still) a largish peninsula and a largish bay, too.
